definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: After a year of not being H.'s girlfriend, K. was accepted into the University of Malaya.
sentences.chinese: 與H分手一年後，K收到了馬來亞大學的通知書。

sentences.english: Payment via Maybank and Public Bank only.
sentences.chinese: 只限付款在馬來亞和大衆銀行。

sentences.english: Since then contact were lost and severed with Malaya because of the World War.
sentences.chinese: 因爲世界大戰爆發，所以他們與馬來亞就失去了聯繫。

sentences.english: Dr. Lee Poh Ping is a Senior Research Fellow in the Institute of China Studies, University of Malaya.
sentences.chinese: 李寶平博士爲馬來亞大學中國研究中心的高級研究員。

sentences.english: Rubber became the staple of the Malayan economy.
sentences.chinese: 橡膠成了馬來亞經濟的支柱產品。

sentences.english: TT to a Maybank account in Brunei, Malaysia, or the Philippines.
sentences.chinese: 特向在文萊，馬來西亞，菲律賓或馬來亞銀行帳戶。

sentences.english: In parts of Malaya, the women keep harems of men.
sentences.chinese: 馬來亞的部分地區，女人男妾成羣。

definition: fire of war everywhere (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
the Mukden or Manchurian Railway Incident of 18th September 1931 used by the Japanese as a pretext to annex Manchuria/also known as Liutiaogou incident 柳條溝事變|柳条沟事变
